125b4('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
125b5('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
125b6('bum): ko'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
125b7('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
126a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po med
126a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
126a3('bum): thams cad kyi rten yin te/ wa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
126a4('bum): ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
126a5('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni
126a6('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
126a7('bum): de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lo brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
126b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/
126b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang /
126b3('bum): mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos
126b4('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis
126b5('bum): dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
126b6('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang / mau dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan
126b7('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis byang chub
127a1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
127a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin to// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
127a3('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127a4('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
127a5('bum): ko'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lce dang / mi dang /
127a6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
127a7('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la
127b1('bum): brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka tshad med pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
127b2('bum): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzugs
127b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
127b4('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
127b5('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mthar gyis gnas
127b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
127b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
128a1('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shri ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
128a2('bum): dpa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
128a3('bum): na no/ / de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
128a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/
128a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang /
128a6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
128a7('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
128b1('bum): stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
128b2('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
128b3('bum): shi ka mi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi
128b4('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/ / de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang
128b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po
128b6('bum): la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
128b7('bum): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi
129a1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang /
129a2('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
129a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin to// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis lam
129a4('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
129a5('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/
129a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
129a7('bum): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyer gnyis pa/
129b1('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag
129b2('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha
129b3('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil
129b4('bum): snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
129b5('bum): nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
129b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
129b7('bum): la byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
130a1('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed//
130a2('bum): mchod par byed na bson nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka mchod rten gcig la zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de
130a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed
130a4('bum): pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /
130a5('bum): lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror
130a6('bum): byas bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shri ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du
130a7('bum): 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs
130b1('bum): gyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
130b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/ gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
130b3('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
130b4('bum): ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhig gi// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bre mo gang la la zhig
130b5('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag
130b6('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas
130b7('bum): kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi
131a1('bum): ba dan dang / rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shrI ka de la ji snyam du
131a2('bum): sems bor phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo do'i bsod nams mang du 'phel las/ brgya byin gyis gi sela~M baM/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa ma
131a3('bum): / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/ kauT shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi blo 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bas du byas te/ 'dzid pa
131a4('bum): dang 'ang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / rjes dong / byug pa dang /
131a5('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ bu dud du byed/ mchod par byed
131a6('bum): no bsong nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ koN+Tha ba~M ku gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang gi lta nag gi/ kau
131a7('bum): ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu 'di
131b1('bum): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi
131b2('bum): 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
131b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ kau'u shi ka de la
131b4('bum): ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
131b5('bum): pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa
131b6('bum): dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
131b7('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na
132a1('bum): @bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta
132a2('bum): zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
132a3('bum): po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lho rdzas kyi me
132a4('bum): tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi
132a5('bum): gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/
132a6('bum): ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
132a7('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/ ko ru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /
132b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
132b2('bum): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches
132b3('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka ga la
132b4('bum): te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
132b5('bum): khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
132b6('bum): lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs
132b7('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na
133a1('bum): ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
133a2('bum): 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shI ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
133a3('bum): pa 'di bris shing 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
133a4('bum): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed
133a5('bum): mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ / ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang
133a6('bum): ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las/ sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
133a7('bum): 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas
133b1('bum): kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
133b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod
133b3('bum): pa byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub
133b4('bum): par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang
133b5('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/
133b6('bum): phu dud du byas mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das do lags so// bde bar
133b7('bum): gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par
134a1('bum): bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror
134a2('bum): bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
134a3('bum): sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i
134a4('bum): mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng
134a5('bum): ba dang lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha
134a6('bum): rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs pas rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

134b1('bum): che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /

135a2('bum): mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal

135a5('bum): du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can
135a6('bum): re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad
135a7('bum): phye pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /

136a6('bum): pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas

136b6('bum): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha
136b7('bum): stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
137a1('bum): phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
137a2('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/
137a3('bum): de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mang ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas
137a4('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / chub par bgyid cing / de la me tog dang /

137a6('bum): stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i
137a7('bum): chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
137b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
137b2('bum): pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
137b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
137b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
137b5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
137b6('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
137b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang /
138a1('bum): lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
138a2('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
138a3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
138a4('bum): 'dus so/ / de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
138a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu
138a6('bum): dgu'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs
138a7('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing
138b1('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
138b2('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
138b3('bum): de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ dpag tu med par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
138b4('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni
138b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol
138b6('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes
138b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa
139a1('bum): nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab
139a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'dus
139a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
139a4('bum): pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
139a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
139a6('bum): byung ba ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong
139a7('bum): pa nyid do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// /
139b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
139b2('bum): pa las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//
139b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab kyi
139b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni gzugs
139b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mthar gyi gnas pa'i
139b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// shes rab
139b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
140a1('bum): ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/
140a2('bum): byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byams pa chen
140a3('bum): po'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol
140a4('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sems can yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o//
140a5('bum): koke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
140a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
140a7('bum): las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni theg pa chen po'o// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bla na med pa
140b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ / ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du
140b2('bum): byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
140b3('bum): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/
140b4('bum): mchod par byas na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang //
140b5('bum): bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyur
140b6('bum): yang nye bar mi bzod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi dkon mchog nub par mi
140b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
141a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
141a2('bum): pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
141a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
141a4('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa
141a5('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig
141a6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig
141a7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha
141b1('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos
141b2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// /
141b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
141b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig
141b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du
141b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
141b7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
142a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par
142a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge
142a3('bum): 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
142a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
142a5('bum): snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
142a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing
142a7('bum): mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten
142b1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha
142b2('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul
142b3('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
142b4('bum): ro/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
142b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
142b6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
142b7('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
143a1('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i
143a2('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom
143a3('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
143a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
143a5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do// chos kyi 'khor
143a6('bum): lo bskor ba yod do/ / sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
143a7('bum): gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul
143b1('bum): dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /
143b2('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha
143b3('bum): rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras
143b4('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha
143b5('bum): gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dgang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143b6('bum): bcang bar bya'o/ / grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi
143b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ / grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang /
144a1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi
144a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

144a5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
144a6('bum): ro/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

144b1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong

144b6('bum): stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung

145a1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung

145a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig
145a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
145b1('bum): rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
145b2('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
145b3('bum): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum
145b4('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang mtshams brdal lo snyam na de'i tshe/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis
145b5('bum): sems la kha ton gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag smos shing rnam par
145b6('bum): 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na'ang / ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi
145b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i
146a1('bum): gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
146a2('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ gang su'ang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis bla na
146a3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
146a4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas phung po ma
146a5('bum): lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
146a6('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
146a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
146b1('bum): dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/
146b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
146b3('bum): sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
146b4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so//
146b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab
146b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o/ / dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de
146b7('bum): bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig
147a1('bum): sngags so/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
147a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa
147a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
147a4('bum): kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
147a5('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag
147a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig
147a7('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na
147b1('bum): yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa
147b2('bum): yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa
147b3('bum): yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
147b4('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin//
147b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma
147b6('bum): dang tha ma med pa sto ba nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong
147b7('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
148a1('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dran pa
148a2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams
148a3('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod
148a4('bum): pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
148a5('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig
148a6('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na
148a7('bum): yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
148b1('bum): snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
148b2('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa
148b3('bum): yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin// /
148b4('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra
148b5('bum): bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten
148b6('bum): nayod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyer
148b7('bum): gsum pa/ / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi
149a1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na
149a2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha
149a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su
149a4('bum): yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig
149a5('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig
149a6('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na dgags su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig
149a7('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin// thog ma dang
149b1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod
149b2('bum): pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig
149b3('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med
149b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na
149b5('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na
149b6('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
149b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags
150a1('bum): su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par
150a2('bum): shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/
150a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig
150a4('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin
150a5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten
150a6('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags
150a7('bum): su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
150b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na rtsi dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma tham
150b2('bum): cad gdags su yod do/ / ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
150b3('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /
150b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang //
150b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad
150b6('bum): gdags su yod do/ / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
150b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na'ang
151a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir
151a2('bum): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151a3('bum): chen po thabs mkhas pa gang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
151a4('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa
151a5('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong po nyid la spyod pa dang
151a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang
151a7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod
151b1('bum): pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
151b2('bum): spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
151b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags po'i
151b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshod med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
151b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /
151b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la
151b7('bum): spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par
152a1('bum): rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang /
152a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs
152a3('bum): su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs
152a4('bum): pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o//
152a5('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
152a6('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
152a7('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa
152b1('bum): de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
152b2('bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/ dug gis dus byed par
152b3('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas/ nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur/
152b4('bum): rgyal po dang bla nas gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du
152b5('bum): song na de la glags 'tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar
152b6('bum): bya bar sems so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo deng shes
152b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam
153a1('bum): bya bar sems shing dga' bas sems par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems
153a2('bum): can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag/ snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs
153a3('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni
153a4('bum): tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
153a5('bum): rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
153a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
153a7('bum): lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang //
153b1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang //
153b2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so/
153b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par
153b4('bum): nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur ro// nam yang
153b5('bum): dbul po'i rigs su mi skye'o/ / smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ sme sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag bdar ba 'am/ shan pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs
153b6('bum): sam/ dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom
153b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang 'bral bar mi
154a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ sangs
154a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
154a3('bum): zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a4('bum): pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/
154a5('bum): de dag ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur
154a6('bum): ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu'o// // de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba glags lta ba'i bsam pa can
154a7('bum): brgya tsam zhig/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba brgya
154b1('bum): po glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song na/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan
154b2('bum): dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
154b3('bum): ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed bzung ba de dag
154b4('bum): kha ton du brjod do/ / de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang /
154b5('bum): sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring
154b6('bum): po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/ de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
154b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po
155a1('bum): brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po
155a2('bum): nas nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las
155a3('bum): 'ga' tsam la'ang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags lta ba'i
155a4('bum): bsam pa can sha stag sde/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud du bcas pa/ tshangs par bcas pa dang /
155a5('bum): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar
155a6('bum): ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /
155a7('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa
155b1('bum): kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang
155b2('bum): dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang /
155b3('bum): 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
155b4('bum): phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
155b5('bum): yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /
155b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
155b7('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag
156a1('bum): thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
156a2('bum): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang /

156a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
156a5('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

156b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /

156b5('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
156b6('bum): dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
156b7('bum): cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ shar
157a1('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig/

157a7('bum): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ nub byang gi
157b1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas paji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs
157b2('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
157b3('bum): ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni
