188a7('bum): skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang
188b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma
188b2('bum): dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang /
188b3('bum): mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang lo la shes rab
188b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang
188b5('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur ki bye
188b6('bum): ba dang / bu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa don pa dang / ma dang / gnyen pa shes dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gos dag
188b7('bum): bar bya ba yin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
189a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing yid
189a2('bum): du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang /
189a3('bum): ma yin du bcas pas kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/ spobs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha
189a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan
189a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom
189a6('bum): pabapa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrog
189a7('bum): bapar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs
189b1('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa//
189b2('bum): nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan
189b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin//
189b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par
189b5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dbang po lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
189b6('bum): stobs lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
189b7('bum): ba yin 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
190a1('bum): ba yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
190a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa mi
190a3('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa mi 'phrogs
190a4('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa
190a5('bum): bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/
190a6('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom
190a7('bum): pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan gyis phyir brgal ba ji snyed byung ba la'ang chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
190b1('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
190b2('bum): kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
190b3('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur stir byed pa dang / phu dud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag
190b4('bum): kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyer lnga pa// / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang
190b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha ril tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba der/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal
190b6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /
190b7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang
191a1('bum): kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che
191a2('bum): ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang /
191a3('bum): phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi
191a4('bum): lha de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so//
191a5('bum): ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
191a6('bum): mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /
191a7('bum): snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun sdang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang /
191b1('bum): tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu
191b2('bum): mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
191b3('bum): ci dang lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
191b4('bum): gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dod par sems so// ko'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
191b5('bum): kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang /
191b6('bum): tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang
191b7('bum): tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
192a1('bum): dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang /
192a2('bum): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
192a3('bum): bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par
192a4('bum): bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod par byas shing phyag byas te/ gdud pa
192a5('bum): byas nas phyir 'dong ngo / / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
192a6('bum): gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye ba na dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /
192a7('bum): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang /
192b1('bum): chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dag dang /
192b2('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang /
192b3('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung sdang
192b4('bum): gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang
192b5('bum): chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /
192b6('bum): 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbyang bar byed de/ ke'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do//
192b7('bum): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
193a1('bum): par zhugs pa de dag kyang / der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang //
193a2('bum): bsgrub pa dang / bskya bar bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
193a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde
193a4('bum): ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
193a5('bum): nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir
193a6('bum): bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang
193a7('bum): 'dir mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gzhan 'brul
193b1('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir
193b2('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir
193b3('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge
193b4('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge rgyas kyi lha rnam
193b5('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung che'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba
193b6('bum): dang 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
193b7('bum): 'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og min gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar
194a1('bum): ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du gzhag par snang ba
194a2('bum): chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid
194a3('bum): che ba dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
194a4('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir lhags so// zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/
194a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/ de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub
194a6('bum): par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byas nas shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro// gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji skad cig
194a7('bum): gnas pa de dag kyang / lha mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so// ji lta ji ltar lha mthu
194b1('bum): chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'ang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i gnas kyi
194b2('bum): 'khor kun tu'ang gtsang sbra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i 'khor
194b3('bum): gyi sa'ang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo/ / me tog dang spos kyis gtor to// bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod gzhag go/ dar gyi lda ldi dang gos kyi bla re bre'o// sa'i phyogs de rnam pa
194b4('bum): du mas brgyan par bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / lus
194b5('bum): yang ba dang / lus gsal ba'ang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba'ang nyams
194b6('bum): su spong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas nub mo nyal ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos gus byas na sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// des mthong na'ang de bzhin
194b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/ su gser gyi
195a1('bum): mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/ chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur//
195a2('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
195a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
195a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
195a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
195a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
195a7('bum): gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
195b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/
195b2('bum): dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
195b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
195b4('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i
195b5('bum): don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos
195b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
195b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye
196a1('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
196a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye
196a3('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
196a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
196a5('bum): de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos
196a6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong
196a7('bum): pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi
196b1('bum): don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang
196b2('bum): thos par 'gyur ro/ / dbang po lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag
196b3('bum): bdun po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
196b4('bum): po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye
196b5('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye
196b6('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
196b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ting nge
197a1('bum): 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po//
197a2('bum): de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye
197a3('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ / snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//
197a4('bum): byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
197a5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' brgya
197a6('bum): stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o//
197a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o// zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs
197b1('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
197b2('bum): che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston
197b3('bum): to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin
197b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba
197b5('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par
197b6('bum): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
197b7('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi
198a1('bum): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
198a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun
198a3('bum): du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo
198a4('bum): zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan
198a5('bum): thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
198a6('bum): mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub
198a7('bum): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//

198b3('bum): du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo
198b4('bum): zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos

198b6('bum): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
198b7('bum): khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
199a1('bum): @bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
199a2('bum): sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya myong 'di snyed cigagis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston te/

199a4('bum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang
199a5('bum): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya
199a6('bum): ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lde phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
199a7('bum): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
199b1('bum): rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
199b2('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
199b3('bum): brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag
199b4('bum): kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza'
199b5('bum): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong
199b6('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po
199b7('bum): che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos
200a1('bum): dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang

200a7('bum): khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang /
200b1('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /

200b4('bum): 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror
200b5('bum): bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong mang po yongs su mya
200b6('bum): ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
200b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
201a1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar
201a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po
201a3('bum): che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang

201a5('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang
201a6('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
201a7('bum): mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
201b1('bum): ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de
201b2('bum): ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par
201b3('bum): 'gyur/ lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur/ lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/ gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen
201b4('bum): sman dang yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur/ zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro// /
201b5('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du
201b6('bum): shes chung ba yin/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe
201b7('bum): na de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ / shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang
202a1('bum): g+ha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag
202a2('bum): kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
202a3('bum): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// nub phyogs kyi sangs
202a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
202a5('bum): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub
202a6('bum): sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang rje
202a7('bum): snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang
202b1('bum): sta dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye
202b2('bum): pabar sgrub bo/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
202b3('bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyedade dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// lho nub
202b4('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
202b5('bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs
202b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
202b7('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang /
203a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
203a2('bum): dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ / steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed
203a3('bum): pa dang lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la
203a4('bum): mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/ / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan/
203a5('bum): tan du mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
203a6('bum): dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung / ma bcangs/ ma bklags/ kun chub par ma
203a7('bum): byas tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na'ang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba
203b1('bum): dang spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o//
203b2('bum): phudud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin
203b3('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing
203b4('bum): de bris te me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
203b5('bum): gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten
203b6('bum): gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang /
203b7('bum): gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
204a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te
204a2('bum): nam 'tshe'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan na
204a3('bum): tshogs kyi rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis so//
204a4('bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang
204a5('bum): ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag
204a6('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams pa zhig kyang la las sprul/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/
204a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags
204b1('bum): mi rton pa'ang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur stir
204b2('bum): bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dud du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
204b3('bum): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stir bgyi ba lags
204b4('bum): phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
204b5('bum): mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
204b6('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi
204b7('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes
205a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur stin/
205a2('bum): bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid do//
205a3('bum): nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa
205a4('bum): bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na ni de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/ gzugs
205a5('bum): med pa bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
205a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ babyung ba'i
205a7('bum): phyir ma yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar
205b1('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan
205b2('bum): thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi
205b3('bum): dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa
205b4('bum): ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
205b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
205b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
205b7('bum): yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
206a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi
206a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
206a3('bum): pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
206a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
206a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa
206a6('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
206a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes
206b1('bum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa
206b2('bum): ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
206b3('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
206b4('bum): bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams
206b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
206b6('bum): bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub
206b7('bum): sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi
207a1('bum): slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
207a2('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i
207a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol
207a4('bum): tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong
207a5('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
207a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba
207a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar
207b1('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid che bar sgrub pa ma yin// ngo bo
207b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par
207b3('bum): spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang
207b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yi ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam
207b5('bum): gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams
207b6('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
207b7('bum): smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa
208a1('bum): ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye
208a2('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
208a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma
208a4('bum): yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// zhes bya bar shes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
208a5('bum): yin no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//
208a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya/
208a7('bum): ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//
208b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma
208b2('bum): yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ko'u shi ka legs
208b3('bum): so legs so/ / de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
208b4('bum): tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/ / gsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//
208b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
208b6('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin
208b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i
209a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
209a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a3('bum): la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a4('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
209a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
209a6('bum): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
209a7('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
209b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
209b2('bum): la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la
209b3('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir
209b4('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209b5('bum): gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de
209b6('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir
209b7('bum): zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
210a1('bum): su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid
210a2('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
210a3('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
210a4('bum): nide bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
210a5('bum): ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
210a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i
210a7('bum): mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
210b1('bum): med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
210b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang
210b3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
210b4('bum): med do/ ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
210b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/
210b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar/
210b7('bum): med do/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di
211a1('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
211a2('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis
211a3('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis
211a4('bum): su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
211a5('bum): ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
211a6('bum): bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa
211a7('bum): de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
211b1('bum): ba'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod
211b2('bum): du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// /
211b3('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyi shu rtsa drug pa// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
211b4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni wa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/
211b5('bum): la bslabs pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
211b6('bum): rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/
211b7('bum): der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang / lha'i bu de
212a1('bum): dag 'khor der mchis shing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to// zhes stan de la g.yas
212a2('bum): phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid
212a3('bum): cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
212a4('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos
212a5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
212a6('bum): bgyis shing 'dud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
212a7('bum): bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ba ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab
212b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/ / rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na cha de gnyis
212b2('bum): las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs
212b3('bum): pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab
212b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
212b5('bum): ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
212b6('bum): su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson
212b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
213a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
213a2('bum): mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis
213a3('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis
213a4('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma
213a5('bum): mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis// rtags ma
213a6('bum): mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis
213a7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis//
213b1('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
213b2('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid de smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshar ma ma mchis
213b3('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa snga/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma
213b4('bum): mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
213b5('bum): nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
213b6('bum): thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
213b7('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma
214a1('bum): mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin//
214a2('bum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos
214a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
214a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
214a5('bum): 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste//
214a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
214a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
214b1('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/
214b2('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
214b3('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
214b4('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
214b5('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
214b6('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis
214b7('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
215a1('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
215a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
215a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad
215a4('bum): med pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
215a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par rnams na mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
215a6('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams
215a7('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
215b1('bum): ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med/
215b2('bum): pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
215b3('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par
215b4('bum): shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
215b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
215b6('bum): 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma
215b7('bum): mchis pa sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
216a1('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams//
216a2('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan
216a3('bum): ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
216a4('bum): rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
216a5('bum): ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// /
216a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos
216a7('bum): su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
216b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thos su ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/
216b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang
216b3('bum): smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa
216b4('bum): dang brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
216b5('bum): brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang
216b6('bum): smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags
216b7('bum): ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang /
217a1('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
217a2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
217a3('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang
217a4('bum): phu dud dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin
217a5('bum): du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
217a6('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
217a7('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//
217b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang //
217b2('bum): yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
217b3('bum): dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing /
217b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
217b5('bum): gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
217b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de
217b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
218a1('bum): gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te//
218a2('bum): lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su
218a3('bum): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//
218a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
218a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang
218a6('bum): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang
218a7('bum): shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las
218b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung //
218b2('bum): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis
218b3('bum): bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshogs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa
218b4('bum): dang chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
218b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
218b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
218b7('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
219a1('bum): dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs/
