219a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin
219a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
219a4('bum): lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du
219a5('bum): byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan cing gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung
219a6('bum): zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
219a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang
219b1('bum): tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod
219b2('bum): pa dang chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs
219b3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
219b4('bum): dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris
219b5('bum): shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
219b6('bum): rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
219b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
220a1('bum): klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par
220a2('bum): bgyi'o/ / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par
220a3('bum): bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab
220a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to/ / 'chang ngo // klog go/ kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang
220a5('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid
220a6('bum): pu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel
220a7('bum): ba'o/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
220b1('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
220b2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
220b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas/ rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la rten na/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po rten pas/ sus 'jigs pa
220b4('bum): de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o//
220b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
220b6('bum): ba'i ye shes gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par balnga'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
220b7('bum): nyid blang bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so//
221a1('bum): 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag
221a2('bum): par rig pa bzhi'o/ / 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol
221a3('bum): tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam
221a4('bum): grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
221a5('bum): klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams
221a6('bum): kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro//
221a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
221b1('bum): don du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// bcom
221b2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po
221b3('bum): che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/ mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do// mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan
221b4('bum): na mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so// mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na mkhris pa
221b5('bum): de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen
221b6('bum): po de btags na bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i bro de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel
221b7('bum): lo/ nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// grang ba'i dus na ni nor bur rin po che chen po de
222a1('bum): phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/ / nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro/ ha cang yang
222a2('bum): mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/ / nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/ de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa
222a3('bum): gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/ des de
222a4('bum): mthong ma thag tu dug de'ang byang bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po da ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig 'brus
222a5('bum): bus btab bam/ mig rab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba
222a6('bum): las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nang dam/
222a7('bum): sgesgog ma'i nad dag lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che
222b1('bum): chen po de chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos
222b2('bum): sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ / gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'ang de'i rang
222b3('bum): bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ / gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar po sa dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che
222b4('bum): chen po de gos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ / gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos la brgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal
222b5('bum): na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/ / gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro//
222b6('bum): de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la snyog pa mchis pa'ang nor bu
222b7('bum): rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes
223a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel
223a2('bum): ba'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig
223a3('bum): yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/
223a4('bum): btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi
223a5('bum): rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag gis ni/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po
223a6('bum): che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
223a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du srul stsal ba las/ snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/
223b1('bum): shagazhan yang snod de la mos paskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam/
223b2('bum): sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po
223b3('bum): zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223b4('bum): phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223b5('bum): phyin pa'i snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
223b6('bum): so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
223b7('bum): par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdod do// bcom
224a1('bum): ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
224a2('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims
224a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
224a4('bum): pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
224a5('bum): tu phyin pa'i snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
224a6('bum): gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
224a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
224b1('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
224b2('bum): bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa
224b3('bum): nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod do//
224b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
224b5('bum): de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
224b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma
224b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa
225a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku//
225a2('bum): gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma
225a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med
225a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba
225a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// /
225a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
225a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi
225b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang // /
225b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad
225b3('bum): ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjed
225b4('bum): par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
225b5('bum): ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
225b6('bum): kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
225b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar
226a1('bum): @gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
226a2('bum): gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi snod ngo / / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
226a3('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta
226a4('bum): sbesnyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do//
226a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams
226a6('bum): kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tanaHji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs
226a7('bum): rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
226b1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste
226b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
226b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
226b4('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
226b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi
226b6('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chad med pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lha
226b7('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms
227a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yin
227a2('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i
227a3('bum): yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
227a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i stobs par 'jug pa rnams kyi sdod do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan
227a5('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod de//
227a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
227a7('bum): gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan
227b1('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
227b2('bum): bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
227b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
227b4('bum): gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
227b5('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji
227b6('bum): snyed cig brjerjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
227b7('bum): snod do/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
228a1('bum): kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas
228a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams
228a3('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams
228a4('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
228a5('bum): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
228a6('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
228a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snang
228b1('bum): do bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
228b2('bum): gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
228b3('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
228b4('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta
228b5('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
228b6('bum): gnas nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi sdod
228b7('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/
229a1('bum): gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i/
229a2('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
229a3('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod
229a4('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig rjed par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
229a5('bum): mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ / de bzhin gshesas pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
229a6('bum): pa'i snod do/ / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
229a7('bum): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
229b1('bum): bgyi ste/ mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs/
229b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i sdod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
229b3('bum): sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i
229b4('bum): snod do/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag
229b5('bum): pa'i snod do/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis
229b6('bum): pa dang dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod do/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu
229b7('bum): phyin pa dbri ba dang bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod do/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
230a1('bum): de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'
230a2('bum): 'o/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
230a3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa'o/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// gzhan yang
230a4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdungagis byar bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig
230a5('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag gis byur bur gtams pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/
230a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
230a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgos pas na/ de bzhin gshegs
230b1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur
230b2('bum): stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing
230b3('bum): mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul
230b4('bum): dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin
230b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul
230b6('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol
230b7('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong
231a1('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid song
231a2('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
231a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha
231a4('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
231a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
231a6('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
231a7('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
231b1('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
231b2('bum): ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
231b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs
231b4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs
231b5('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs
231b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su
231b7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus
232a1('bum): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing
232a2('bum): mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal
232a3('bum): bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems
232a4('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
232a5('bum): mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis
232a6('bum): paba'ang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma lags/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232a7('bum): phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa
232b1('bum): lags phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par
232b2('bum): bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
232b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod
232b4('bum): par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
232b5('bum): bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
232b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos
232b7('bum): nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
233a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi//
233a2('bum): mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/
233a3('bum): gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi
233a4('bum): chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
233a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las
233a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
233a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
233b1('bum): dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i
233b2('bum): ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags
233b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ya shes dang / gzugs med
233b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar
233b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs
233b6('bum): kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang
233b7('bum): snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang
234a1('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig
234a2('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/ / de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid
234a3('bum): gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun
234a4('bum): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do//
234a5('bum): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom
234a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
234a7('bum): cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'os pa'i dus kyi de
234b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten cing / bla na med pa yang dag
234b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
234b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag
234b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang
234b5('bum): ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byang ba'i
234b6('bum): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te
234b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
235a1('bum): bu thob bo/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji
235a2('bum): snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ rang sangs rgyas
235a3('bum): gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te rang byang chub thob bo/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
235a4('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
235a5('bum): ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
235a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang
235a7('bum): spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235b1('bum): ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thad du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/
235b2('bum): mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin//
235b3('bum): 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
235b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
235b5('bum): tu phyin pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka/
235b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
235b7('bum): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya nyi shu bdun pa//
236a1('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
236a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can
236a3('bum): du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis
236a4('bum): so/ gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag tu dmigs pa
236a5('bum): ma mchis so/ / byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//
236a6('bum): gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs
236a7('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// snar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmigs pa
236b1('bum): ma mchis so/ / yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// slar dmigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmigs pa ma mchis so// ror dmigs pa sa
236b2('bum): mchis so/ / reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs par
236b3('bum): mchis so/ / sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
236b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus
236b5('bum): te reg par dmigs su ma mchis so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs
236b6('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
236b7('bum): tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis
237a1('bum): so/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma
237a2('bum): mchis so/ / me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
237a3('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs su
237a4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmigs pa ma mchis
237a5('bum): so/ / len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
237a6('bum): par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
237a7('bum): phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid
237b1('bum): du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
237b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa
237b3('bum): nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba med
237b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
237b5('bum): pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du
237b6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par
237b7('bum): spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs
238a1('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags
238a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / bsam gtan rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
238a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so//
238a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge
238a5('bum): 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa
238a6('bum): rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
238a7('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur
238b1('bum): bur dmigs pa ma mchis so/ / dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
238b2('bum): byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i
238b3('bum): tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de
238b4('bum): lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
238b5('bum): des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
238b6('bum): lta'ang ci smos/ / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi// de ma
238b7('bum): lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
239a1('bum): kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang mi
239a2('bum): dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so// bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang
239a3('bum): mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs// le lo'ang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan
239a4('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka 'on
239a5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
239a6('bum): rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
239a7('bum): lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi
239b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par/
239b2('bum): sheshes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / kye'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
239b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
239b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i
239b5('bum): tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
239b6('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i
239b7('bum): tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
240a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi
240a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs
240a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi
240a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
240a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
240a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs
240a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus
240b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med
240b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs
240b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
240b4('bum): tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
240b5('bum): tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi
240b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
240b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
241a1('bum): tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa
241a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs
241a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul
241a4('bum): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul
241a5('bum): dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul
241a6('bum): dang dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad
241a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
241b1('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
241b2('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
241b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
241b4('bum): bapa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam
241b5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes
241b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o/ / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna
241b7('bum): tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du
242a1('bum): na grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do/ / ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas/ thams cad mkhyen/
242a2('bum): pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon
242a3('bum): tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad
242a4('bum): ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o//
242a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
242a6('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud
242a7('bum): du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
242b1('bum): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
242b2('bum): pa ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod nyid kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin
242b3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
242b4('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
242b5('bum): yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo ba shar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs
242b6('bum): te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
242b7('bum): byas bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
243a1('bum): @bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang
243a2('bum): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/
243a3('bum): phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la sprul na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo//
243a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/
243a5('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs
243a6('bum): pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/
243a7('bum): de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
243b1('bum): te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
243b2('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas
243b3('bum): pab bas gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar
243b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang /
243b5('bum): brjod ci bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/
243b6('bum): de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243b7('bum): byiphyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes byas pa med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang
244a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
244a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
244a3('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med do//
244a4('bum): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
244a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//
244a6('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par
244a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing
244b1('bum): rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
244b2('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so/ / 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
244b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am
244b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
244b5('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang /
244b6('bum): mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
244b7('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/
245a1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di snyam sa gang zhig la bdag gi'i ma gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang /
245a2('bum): mchod par byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya snyam na/ ko'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas
245a3('bum): ba'i skye dgu dang / mi dang / lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nang dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na
245a4('bum): babadag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du
245a5('bum): bsams so/ / ko'u shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror byed
245a6('bum): bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/
245a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
245b1('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang /
245b2('bum): mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha
245b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
245b4('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/
245b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de
245b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg
245b7('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
246a1('bum): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna
246a2('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/ / bkur stir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
246a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa
246a4('bum): nyid thob bo/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
246a5('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gsum mo/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lho'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/
246a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
246a7('bum): kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba
246b1('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam klog pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
246b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang /
246b3('bum): 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
246b4('bum): gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
246b5('bum): gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba
246b6('bum): dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
246b7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
247a1('bum): mang po rgya cher bstan to/ / ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi/
247a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
247a3('bum): dang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
247a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang
247a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
247a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
247a7('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang //
247b1('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar//
247b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de
247b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po
247b4('bum): dang snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher
247b5('bum): bstan to/ / de dag la bslabasang shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
247b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na rigs kyi bu 'am//
247b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
248a1('bum): @#/ ko'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas
248a2('bum): yongs su grol ba ma yin no/ / ke'u shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
248a3('bum): ras yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam
248a4('bum): bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rkun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra
248a5('bum): bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
248a6('bum): la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par
248a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni
248b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
248b2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
248b3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams so/ / ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/
248b4('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
248b5('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/
248b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
248b7('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya bin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
249a1('bum): pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyi/
249a2('bum): gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
249a3('bum): shing rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob
